issue.title: [C++] Warning level to CHECKIN can't compile on modern GCC
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4962](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4962). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This is somewhat related to the recent DCHECK change.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4962?focusedCommentId=16798097) by Antoine Pitrou (apitrou):*
Fixed by pull request <https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/3976>
